DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Type Geometry
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of a common geometry for all occurrences of this "element" type as representation maps.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Type Naming
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation:
Provision of basic element attributes for the element type. It includes:

  • Name
  • Description
  • Tag
  • PredefinedType (if available at the element entity definition) as ,
  • ElementType being the user defined type, if the PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.

This information is provided as direct attributes at the element type. The default requirement stipulated by this concept template is that the provision of a Name and of a PredefinedType (if available) is mandatory, whereas the provision of a Description, a Tag and an ElementType is optional.

A model view definition shall clearly define which of those attributes are required to have values, and if there are constraints on those values.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Type Material
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of a common material information for all occurrences of this "element" type. The material information may be provided as a single material, or a material layer set. On import: the material shall be copied to all "element" occurrences, if types are not supported natively.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Type Element Aggregation
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of an aggregation structure (or decomposition tree) of types of physical element, where the element type is either the whole or one of the parts of an aggregated structure.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Type Element Composition
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of an aggregation structure where the element type is part of another element type representing the composite. The element type then provides the partial shape representation map.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Type Element Decomposition
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of an aggregation structure where the element type, representing the composite, is decomposed into parts represented by other element types. The element type being the composite shall not have an own shape representation map. The shape representation maps are provided by the parts.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Type Property Set
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of a common property set for all occurrences of this "element" type. The property set can be an IFC common property set, any IFC property set applicable to the "element" type, or a user/system defined property set. Those property set names shall not start with "Pset_" prefix (not case sensitive). On import: the property sets shall be copied to all "element" occurrences, if types are not supported natively.
